def: the main title of a news story
a concise report or meeting to give information
a sudden start of something unwelcome
a penalty used to enforce rules or laws
something that encourages activity or growth
a form that is different in some way
the quality of being easy to see through or understand
the value of shares; fairness
a rise in prices over time
a temporary economic decline
the release of gas or radiation
able to be replaced naturally
a substance that protects against disease
an important discovery or development
general agreement among a group
a new plan or process to achieve something
a sudden powerful increase
a standard used to compare with others
a range of investments held by a person or organization
the ability to recover quickly from difficulties
